channel.title: Todo on research notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Todo on research notebook

item.title: first post
item.description: Readings: Reproducibility – how to define for this context. Ecology / decision support tools. Reproducibility of ecological models used for decision support tools. Interested in the sorts of decisions that we make as modellers… e.g. what performance measures do we use, there are so many different ways of valuing the objectives. And depending on which measure you use, you might judge the outcomes of each of the different strategies under consideration differently….
